subject: Your OTP Code
htmlContent:
<div style="margin:0;padding:0;background:#f4f6f8;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">

 <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f4f6f8;padding:30px 0;">

  <tr>

   <td align="center">

    <table width="600" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

     style="background:#ffffff;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden;

     box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);">


     <!-- Header -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#0d6efd;padding:24px;text-align:center;">

      <img src="{{site_logo}}"

     alt="{{site_name}}"

     style="

      max-width:180px;

      height:auto;

      display:block;

      margin:0 auto;

     " />

       <p style="margin:6px 0 0;color:#e9f1ff;font-size:14px;">

        Email Verification

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Body -->

     <tr>

      <td style="padding:30px;color:#333333;">

       <h2 style="margin-top:0;font-size:20px;">

        Hello {{firstName}},

       </h2>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        Welcome to <strong>{{site_name}}</strong>!  

        Please use the One-Time Password (OTP) below to complete your signup process.

       </p>


       <!-- OTP Box -->

       <div style="text-align:center;margin:30px 0;">

        <div style="

         display:inline-block;

         padding:16px 30px;

         font-size:24px;

         letter-spacing:4px;

         font-weight:bold;

         color:#0d6efd;

         border:2px dashed #0d6efd;

         border-radius:8px;

         background:#f8faff;">

         {{otp}}

        </div>

       </div>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        This OTP is valid for a limited time.  

        Please do not share it with anyone.

       </p>


       <p style="margin-top:24px;font-size:13px;color:#777;">

        If you did not request this verification, you can safely ignore this email.

       </p>


       <p style="margin-top:30px;font-size:14px;">

        Best Regards,<br>

        <strong>{{site_name}} Support Team</strong>

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Footer -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#f1f3f5;padding:15px;text-align:center;

       font-size:12px;color:#888;">

       © {{site_name}} — All rights reserved

      </td>

     </tr>


    </table>

   </td>

  </tr>

 </table>

</div>

subject: Your OTP Code
htmlContent:
<div style="margin:0;padding:0;background:#f4f6f8;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">

 <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f4f6f8;padding:30px 0;">

  <tr>

   <td align="center">

    <table width="600" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

     style="background:#ffffff;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden;

     box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);">


     <!-- Header -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#0d6efd;padding:24px;text-align:center;">

        <img src="{{site_logo}}"

     alt="{{site_name}}"

     style="

      max-width:180px;

      height:auto;

      display:block;

      margin:0 auto;

     " />

       <p style="margin:6px 0 0;color:#e9f1ff;font-size:14px;">

        Email Verification

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Body -->

     <tr>

      <td style="padding:30px;color:#333333;">

       <h2 style="margin-top:0;font-size:20px;">

        Hello {{firstName}},

       </h2>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        Welcome to <strong>{{site_name}}</strong>!  

        Please use the One-Time Password (OTP) below to complete your signup process.

       </p>


       <!-- OTP Box -->

       <div style="text-align:center;margin:30px 0;">

        <div style="

         display:inline-block;

         padding:16px 30px;

         font-size:24px;

         letter-spacing:4px;

         font-weight:bold;

         color:#0d6efd;

         border:2px dashed #0d6efd;

         border-radius:8px;

         background:#f8faff;">

         {{otp}}

        </div>

       </div>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        This OTP is valid for a limited time.  

        Please do not share it with anyone.

       </p>


       <p style="margin-top:24px;font-size:13px;color:#777;">

        If you did not request this verification, you can safely ignore this email.

       </p>


       <p style="margin-top:30px;font-size:14px;">

        Best Regards,<br>

        <strong>{{site_name}} Support Team</strong>

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Footer -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#f1f3f5;padding:15px;text-align:center;

       font-size:12px;color:#888;">

       © {{site_name}} — All rights reserved

      </td>

     </tr>


    </table>

   </td>

  </tr>

 </table>

</div>

subject: Reset Your Password
htmlContent:
<div style="margin:0;padding:0;background:#f4f6f8;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">

 <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f4f6f8;padding:30px 0;">

  <tr>

   <td align="center">

    <table width="600" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

     style="background:#ffffff;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden;

     box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);">


     <!-- Header -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#0d6efd;padding:24px;text-align:center;">

      <img src="{{site_logo}}"

     alt="{{site_name}}"

     style="

      max-width:180px;

      height:auto;

      display:block;

      margin:0 auto;

     " />

       <p style="margin:6px 0 0;color:#e9f1ff;font-size:14px;">

        Password Reset

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Body -->

     <tr>

      <td style="padding:30px;color:#333333;">

       <h2 style="margin-top:0;font-size:20px;">

        Hello {{firstName}},

       </h2>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        We received a request to reset your password for your

        <strong>{{site_name}}</strong> account.

       </p>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        Click the button below to create a new password.

        This link is valid for <strong>30 minutes</strong>.

       </p>


       <!-- Button -->

       <div style="text-align:center;margin:32px 0;">

        <a href="{{reset_link}}"

         style="background:#0d6efd;color:#ffffff;text-decoration:none;

         padding:14px 30px;border-radius:6px;

         display:inline-block;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;">

         Reset Password

        </a>

       </div>


       <p style="font-size:13px;color:#666;">

        If the button doesn’t work, copy and paste this link into your browser:

       </p>


     

       <p style="margin-top:24px;font-size:13px;color:#777;">

        If you didn’t request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

       </p>


       <p style="margin-top:30px;font-size:14px;">

        Best Regards,<br>

        <strong>{{site_name}} Support Team</strong>

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Footer -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#f1f3f5;padding:15px;text-align:center;

       font-size:12px;color:#888;">

       © {{site_name}} — All rights reserved

      </td>

     </tr>


    </table>

   </td>

  </tr>

 </table>

</div>

subject: Your Subscription is Active
htmlContent:
<div style="margin:0;padding:0;background:#f4f6f8;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">

 <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f4f6f8;padding:30px 0;">

  <tr>

   <td align="center">

    <table width="600" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background:#ffffff;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden;box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);">


     <!-- Header -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#0d6efd;padding:20px;text-align:center;">

    <img src="{{site_logo}}"

     alt="{{site_name}}"

     style="

      max-width:180px;

      height:auto;

      display:block;

      margin:0 auto;

     " />       <p style="margin:5px 0 0;color:#e9f1ff;font-size:14px;">Subscription Activated</p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Body -->

     <tr>

      <td style="padding:30px;color:#333333;">

       <h2 style="margin-top:0;font-size:20px;">Hello {{firstName}},</h2>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        Thank you for subscribing to <strong>{{site_name}}</strong>.

        Your subscription has been successfully activated.

       </p>


       <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

        <strong>Plan:</strong> {{plan_name}}<br>

       </p>




       <p style="font-size:13px;color:#666;">

        If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our support team.

       </p>


       <p style="margin-top:30px;font-size:14px;">

        Best Regards,<br>

        <strong>{{site_name}} Support Team</strong>

       </p>

      </td>

     </tr>


     <!-- Footer -->

     <tr>

      <td style="background:#f1f3f5;padding:15px;text-align:center;font-size:12px;color:#888;">

       © {{site_name}} — All rights reserved

      </td>

     </tr>


    </table>

   </td>

  </tr>

 </table>

</div>

subject: Lead Generated
htmlContent:
<div style="margin:0;padding:0;background:#f4f6f8;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">


 <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f4f6f8;padding:30px 0;">

 <tr>

  <td align="center">

  <table width="600" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

   style="background:#ffffff;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden;

   box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);">


   <!-- Header -->

   <tr>

   <td style="background:#0d6efd;padding:24px;text-align:center;">

    <img src="{{site_logo}}"

     alt="{{site_name}}"

     style="

      max-width:180px;

      height:auto;

      display:block;

      margin:0 auto;

     " />

    <p style="margin:6px 0 0;color:#e9f1ff;font-size:14px;">

      Lead Generation Successful


    </p>

   </td>

   </tr>


   <!-- Body -->

   <tr>

   <td style="padding:30px;color:#333333;">

    <h2 style="margin-top:0;font-size:20px;">

    Hello {{firstName}},

    </h2>


    <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

    Great news! Your lead generation request has been processed successfully on <strong>{{site_name}}</strong>.

    </p>


    <!-- Leads Info Box -->

    <div style="text-align:center;margin:30px 0;">

    <div style="

     display:inline-block;

     padding:20px 30px;

     font-size:16px;

     font-weight:bold;

     color:#0d6efd;

     border:2px dashed #0d6efd;

     border-radius:8px;

     background:#f8faff;">

     Generated Leads: <strong>{{generated}}</strong><br>

     Remaining Leads: <strong>{{remaining}}</strong>

    </div>

    </div>


    <p style="font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;">

    You can now access these leads from your dashboard. Make sure to follow up promptly to get the best results.

    </p>


    <p style="margin-top:24px;font-size:13px;color:#777;">

    If you did not request this, please contact our support team immediately.

    </p>


    <p style="margin-top:30px;font-size:14px;">

    Best Regards,<br>

    <strong>{{site_name}} Support Team</strong>

    </p>

   </td>

   </tr>


   <!-- Footer -->

   <tr>

   <td style="background:#f1f3f5;padding:15px;text-align:center;

    font-size:12px;color:#888;">

    © {{site_name}} — All rights reserved

   </td>

   </tr>


  </table>

  </td>

 </tr>

 </table>

</div>
